solution.title: Third Party MOAT Report
solution.description: Import MOAT and DBM data into a BigQuery table and connect to dashboard.
instructions: The MOAT report must span 30 days back, and run daily.

The MOAT Display report must contain exactly the fields:Date
Campaign ID
Campaign Label
Placement ID
Placement Label
Human and Viewable Impressions
Human and Viewable Rate
Human and Fully On-Screen Measurable Impressions
Human and AVOC Impressions
Human, Audible & Fully On-Screen for Half of Duration (15 sec. cap) Impressions
Wait for BigQuery->StarThinker Data->{{DATASET}}->MOAT_Display to be created or click Run Now.
Copy Third Party MOAT Sample Data Source.
Copy Third Party MOAT Sample Report.
When prompted choose the new data source you just created.
Or give these intructions to the client.

from.query: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Report_Day, Advertiser, Advertiser_ID, Insertion_Order, Insertion_Order_ID, Creative, Creative_ID, DCM_Placement_ID AS Placement_ID, Impressions AS DBM_Impressions, Viewable_Impressions AS DBM_Viewable_Impressions, Measurable_Impressions AS DBM_Measurable_Impressions, 0 AS MOAT_Human_Viewable_Impressions , 0 AS MOAT_Human_FOS_Measurable_Impressions , 0 AS MOAT_Human_AVOC_Impressions , 0 AS MOAT_Human_Audible_FOS_Half_Duration_Impressions , Revenue, 'DBM' AS Source FROM [[PARAMETER].MOAT_DBM_Report] OMIT RECORD IF Creative_ID IS NULL), ( SELECT MOAT.Report_Day AS Report_Day, DBM.Advertiser AS Advertiser, DBM.Advertiser_ID AS Advertiser_ID, COALESCE(DBM.Insertion_Order, MOAT.Campaign_Label) AS Insertion_Order, COALESCE(DBM.Insertion_Order_ID, MOAT.Campaign_ID) AS Insertion_Order_ID, MOAT.Placement_Label AS Creative, MOAT.Placement_ID AS Creative_ID, 0 AS DBM_Impressions, 0 AS DBM_Measurable_Impressions, 0 AS DBM_Viewable_Impressions, MOAT.Human_Viewable_Impressions AS MOAT_Human_Viewable_Impressions, MOAT.Human_FOS_Measurable_Impressions AS MOAT_Human_FOS_Measurable_Impressions, MOAT.Human_AVOC_Impressions AS MOAT_Human_AVOC_Impressions, MOAT.Human_Audible_FOS_Half_Duration_Impressions AS MOAT_Human_Audible_FOS_Half_Duration_Impressions, 0.0 AS Revenue, 'MOAT' AS Source FROM [[PARAMETER].MOAT_Display] AS MOAT LEFT JOIN ( SELECT FIRST(Advertiser) AS Advertiser, FIRST(Advertiser_ID) AS Advertiser_ID, First(Insertion_Order) AS Insertion_Order, First(Insertion_Order_ID) AS Insertion_Order_ID, REGEXP_REPLACE(Creative, r'_MOAT$', '') AS Creative FROM [[PARAMETER].MOAT_DBM_Report] GROUP BY Creative) AS DBM ON MOAT.Placement_Label = DBM.Creative);
